titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment under the Medicare Program for certain services performed by chiropractors.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize payment for specified services performed by chiropractors, including x-rays, physical examinations, and related routine laboratory tests.
